data.prayer: the county of Lakshmipur has (about) 2,166 people who know Jesus, 5,188 people who know about him culturally, and 1,721,846 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lakshmipur, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Lakshmipur who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, we pray that the county of Lakshmipur be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lakshmipur, Chittagong, Bangladesh find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Gain people.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Lakshmipur, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Lakshmipur, Chittagong, Bangladesh to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.section_summary:
the county of Lakshmipur, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 1,729,200.

We estimate Lakshmipur has 2,166 people who might know Jesus, 5,188 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,721,846 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Lakshmipur that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Lakshmipur
